description: Defines a Flutter widget for a search screen that allows users to search for songs, artists, or albums using a mock data service. Includes UI components like a text input, progress indicator, and a list of search results.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides the search interface.

classes.name: _SearchScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the search logic, UI updates, and user interactions for SearchScreen.

methods.name: _doSearch
methods.description: Performs search query using the DataService, updates results list, and manages loading indicator.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the TextEditingController when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the search screen, including input field, progress indicator, and results list.
